definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: variegated stuff (woven or embroidered);—abs. ´[[ר]]: Ju Jdg 5:30 +; sf. [[רִקְמָתֵח]] Ez Eze 16:18, [[תָם]]- Eze 26:16; du. [[רִקְמָתַיִם]] Ju Jdg 5:30; pl. [[רְקָמוֹת]] Ps 45:15;—(piece of) variegated stuff, Ju Jdg 5:30, Jdg 5:30, for garments Ez Eze 16:10, Eze 16:13, Eze 27:16, Eze 27:24, Ps 45:15; explicitly, ´[[בִּגְדֵי ר]]: Ez Eze 16:18, Eze 26:16; ´[[ר]]: appar. = variegated work Eze 27:7; fig. of variegated plumage Eze 17:3; of variegated stone 1Ch 29:2.
